childMdx.excerpt: It's just a long tape traced with endless 1's and 0's as far as the eye can see, until I seek myself and join the ends, though this sight…
A bird sings alone its sunset song, the only sound ever made:   worship.   Praise for One from this single starling stirred by sea breeze…
There is only one light passing through two, interfering with itself to paint a pattern on the screen of  you .   Gradually the gaps grow…
